Name: King Smash
About the game: King Smash - TopDown is a dynamic game with elements of a slasher. player destroys his opponents with a hammer, dodges bullets behind blocks, or breaks through blocks and opens up new opportunities for passing the level, thereby building tactics for each specific battle. Game Features: Level Destructibility, Beautiful Pixel-Art, Lots of Levels, Difficulty.
